title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, fluent builder style.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for running Ollama on edge devices, Kubernetes, GPU clusters, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama; static binary, tiny runtime.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama sidecars in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that proxies to Ollama with session memory.
